concept.title: Billing
concept.shortdesc: Billing App provides a powerful and flexible billing solution that enables the enterprises to grow and prosper in this challenging environment by managing their business efficiently.

conbody.p: Use the Billing App to allocate call credit and top up extensions/accounts, and conduct call analysis. Both prepaid and postpaid payments are supported. Rate can be set according to extensions, time periods, call duration, prefix number and number length. Real-time top-up history and statistics are all recorded.

p.note: If you uninstall the Billing App, all of your billing data will be erased.

li.p: Users could choose to charge the call cost from the extension level or the account level.

ul.li: Extension level: call credits are assigned to specific extensions.
Account level: call credits are assigned to pre-configured accounts and shared by users who know the password (PIN code).

li.p: The immediate real-time billing empowers the user by making rating, charging and balance and account management responsive, interactive and flexible.
Prepaid and postpaid modes provide real-time billing.
Rate can be set according to extensions/accounts, time periods, call duration, call types (whether local or international, from landline or mobile phone).
Provides call detail reports (display usage by time frames, extension/account, and trunks) for management and traffic analysis.
